meanings.definition: A loose-fitting garment worn for sleeping, typically reaching to the knees.
meanings.sent1: I like to wear my cozy nightshirts to bed.
meanings.sent2: She bought new nightshirts for her summer sleepwear.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear the nightshirts as a cape, thinking it was a superhero costume.
meanings.sent4: The nightshirts were like fluffy clouds embracing me as I drifted off to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the nightshirts felt like a gentle hug as I dozed off.
